PERSONA:
meet robert, a 68-year-old married man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states. he is a high school graduate and identifies as a white non-hispanic american born in the u.s.

robert doesn't affiliate with any particular religion but considers himself unaffiliated or "nothing in particular." while he seldom attends religious services, he leans towards moderate or conservative democratic ideologies. he is an independent voter who leans towards the democratic party.

robert comes from a middle-income family, earning between $50,000 and $60,000 annually. he is a registered voter and is absolutely certain about his registration at his current address. despite his age, robert is quite tech-savvy, using the internet several times a day.

in his free time, robert doesn't engage in any formal volunteer work, but he enjoys spending quality time with his wife and family. he leads a relatively simple life, content with his moderate ideologies and middle-class lifestyle in the midwest metropolitan area.
